channel.title: physics.gen-ph updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: physics.gen-ph updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: The post-Newtonian metric of a self-gravitating and collapsing thin spherical shell
item.description: arXiv:2402.05134v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We calculate the metric for the thought experiment of a self-gravitating and collapsing infinitely-thin spherical shell, in the first post-Newtonian approximation for general relativity. The post-Newtonian dynamic equations of the test particles inside and outside the shell are achieved respectively.
item.dc:creator: Wenbin Lin
